title: My GCash payment or transaction was unsuccessful but my wallet was deducted How do I get a refund
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [My GCash payment or transaction was unsuccessful but my wallet was deducted. How do I get a refund?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40995097563673-My-GCash-payment-or-transaction-was-unsuccessful-but-my-wallet-was-deducted-How-do-I-get-a-refund)
- [Differences between Send Money, Bank Transfer, Cash In, Cash Out](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40136231787929-Differences-between-Send-Money-Bank-Transfer-Cash-In-Cash-Out)
- [Manage your GCash account](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38037184606105-Manage-your-GCash-account)
- [GCash Features for Basic vs Fully Verified Accounts](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/19576345096217-GCash-Features-for-Basic-vs-Fully-Verified-Accounts)
- [Get Started with GCash](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/19577792850457-Get-Started-with-GCash)
- [Reach your Money Goals](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/19577994564761-Reach-your-Money-Goals)
- [Protect Your GCash Account](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/19578518834457-Protect-Your-GCash-Account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

To check if your payment or transaction was successful, please check your GCash App Inbox or GCash [Transaction History](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360034155433-How-do-I-view-and-download-my-GCash-transaction-history). Then, check if your GCash wallet balance had any deductions.

If the transaction doesn’t appear in your Transaction History and there’s no wallet deduction, it means the transaction was unsuccessful and didn’t go through.

Some transactions may take time to process. This means your GCash wallet will be deducted right away, but our partners may need extra time to complete and post/process the transaction. Here are the services with processing times:

- **Bills** \- Depends on the biller. You can view the full list of [Partner Billers and processing times here](https://new.gcash.com/partners/billers).
- **GFunds** \- Check out the Order Processing Days for GFunds [here](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900004505746-Order-processing-days-for-GFunds-transactions).
- **GStocks PH** \- Buy/Sell Orders will be posted to PSE immediately but will be processed during Trading Hours.
  - Trading Hours:
    - Mon- Fri (excluding holidays)
    - 9AM - 12PM and 1PM - 3PM
- **GCrypto** \- Buy/Sell Orders will be **in real-time.**

If there is no record in your Transaction History but your account balance was deducted, we may need to look into this further. To help you with your concerns, choose among the GCash features and services below for more information:

[Load](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30281393343769-Charged-Load-more-than-once)

[Bank Transfer](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31987307617945-I-transferred-money-from-my-GCash-account-to-a-bank-or-another-e-wallet-but-it-was-not-received-What-do-I-do)

[Cash In](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/28525930255769-I-didn-t-receive-my-cash-in-to-my-GCash-wallet-What-do-I-do)

[Cards](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30287118998041-Paid-already-but-it-is-not-reflected-in-the-account)

[GCredit](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39853751764505-I-can-t-make-a-payment-for-my-GCredit-account-What-do-I-do)

[GGives](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39855188266649-I-can-t-make-a-payment-for-my-GGives-account-What-do-I-do)

[GLoan](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39051175012377-I-can-t-make-a-payment-for-my-GLoan-account-What-do-I-do)

GSave ( [Withdrawal](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40583365782041-I-made-a-withdrawal-from-my-GSave-account-but-it-still-has-not-been-credited-to-my-GCash-wallet-What-do-I-do) or [Deposit](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30244088945817-I-made-a-deposit-to-my-GSave-account-but-it-still-has-not-been-credited-to-my-account-What-do-I-do))

[GCrypto](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/31268609167001-Get-Help-with-GCrypto)

[Scan to Pay](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31316001083289-Merchant-didn-t-receive-the-payment-and-or-SMS-when-I-used-Scan-to-Pay)

[Send Money](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30245019590553-I-sent-money-from-my-GCash-to-another-GCash-account-but-the-recipient-didn-t-receive-it-What-should-I-do)

[Online Payments](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31317973344153-Problem-with-Pay-Online)

[GFunds](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/35735707460505-I-cannot-buy-or-sell-in-GFunds)

[GCrypto](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31309437398041-Unable-to-buy-sell-on-GCrypto)

[GStocks PH](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31256477945369-Buy-or-Sell-Order-in-GStocks-PH-did-not-reflect)

[GLife/Bingoplus](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/35429350806041-I-have-an-issue-with-Cashback-by-Findshare)

[ATM Withdrawal](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30287261434009-The-ATM-did-not-release-any-money-after-withdrawing-using-my-GCash-Card)

[Previous](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40995097563673-My-GCash-payment-or-transaction-was-unsuccessful-but-my-wallet-was-deducted-How-do-I-get-a-refund#)
